column4: heres a puzzler for you guys, why in ubuntu is my internet at around 8mbps, while in windows xp it wont go past 4mbps, this is a clean install of genuine windows with the drivers that came on the disk for the wifi stick
the download speeds in ubuntu are authentic too, i can download from torrents at 1mbps
microsoft uses a broken tcp/ip stack apparently.  I've had the same sort of thing happen.
